name: Mara
title: Innkeeper of the Rusty Tankard
description: A friendly, bustling figure who keeps the tavern running smoothly.

personality.goal: To keep her inn running amidst the swamp's dangers and make enough profit to send her daughter to a safer place away from Shadowfen.
personality.fear: The constant anxiety of losing her inn to the swamp's hauntings or being forced to close due to poor business.
personality.secret: She secretly assists travelers by guiding them through the swamp, charging a steep fee while using the knowledge to smuggle out valuable herbs.
personality.speech_pattern: Mara speaks in a husky, gravelly tone, often punctuating her sentences with dry humor or a wry chuckle, and tends to drop the final 'g' in her words, which reflects her rough, pragmatic upbringing.
relationships: Owes a favor to Old Nareth, the local herbalist, for helping her daughter during an illness.
Has a cautious alliance with Drenna, a wandering thief who sometimes brings customers her way, understanding the value of adaptability.
Respects but keeps her distance from the local spirits, aware that they watch her every move.

nod: Mara gives you a short, approving nod.
Mara tilts her head in acknowledgment.
smile: Mara's stern face softens for a moment before she looks away.
wave: Mara waves back while continuing to wipe down a table.
